mapper.insert:
insert into basicpivot (Length, StartId, High, Low, PivotType, Scratches) values
(#{dpattern.length, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{dpattern.startId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dpattern.high, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{dpattern.low, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{dpattern.directionType, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{dpattern.polyline, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
